## Construction of Canopies in Faro, Yukon

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Reference and Amendment Information
* Reference Number: CB-444-47576115
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: 202500759

#### Tender Information
* Publication Date: July 3, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 18, 2024, 14:00:00 (EDT)
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Procurement Information
* Procurement Category: Construction Services (CNST)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Project Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals for the construction of three (3) wood canopies at the new detachment in Faro, Yukon. The contract period will be for 32 weeks from the date of contract award.

#### Important Documents
Please refer to the attachments for the Invitation to Tender, Special Instructions, and Amendments.

#### Contact Information
For any questions or requests for clarification during the solicitation period, please submit them in writing to the contracting authority at Brianne.Leach@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
Canada will make available the NPP, bid solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

#### Indigenous Procurement
The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity. For more information and to review eligibility criteria and register, visit: www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory. If you are an Indigenous business, please note that.registering in the IBD can increase your company’s visibility and may provide additional business opportunities.

### Additional Requirements
* Bidders are responsible for obtaining copies of bid forms, special instructions, and amendments issued prior to bid closing, and are to ensure they are addressed in the submitted bid.
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Canada will not be responsible for information found on websites of third parties.
